dc:title: CPIC CYP2D6 fluvoxamine Recommendations Implementation
dc:description: KGrid CPIC guidelines CYP2D6 Phenotype to fluvoxamine Recommendation

schema:creator.schema:affiliation: Knowledge Systems Lab, University of Michigan Medical School

hasService.dc:description: A JavaScript library with a function that accepts a phenotype and provide drug dosing recommendations.

hasTest.dc:title: Tests written for the library service
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the functionality and correctness of the library service.
